summary: An atheist is forced to consult an exorcist after his daughter shows signs of being possessed.
cast: Sudeep|Amruta Khanvilkar|Ahsaas Channa|Ashwini Kalsekar|K.K. Raina|Ganesh Yadav|Shrey Bawa|Jyoti Subhash|Kenneth Desai|Lillete Dubey|Anu Ansari|Shankar Sachdev|Haider Mohammed Javed|Bharat Kaul|Geetanjali Rao|Zakir Hussain|Kishore Kadam|Javed Rizvi
title: Phoonk
